Constructor Detail

MimeUtils

public MimeUtils()
Method Detail

getUniqueValue

public static java.lang.String getUniqueValue()
Get a unique value. Similar to javax.mail.internet.UniqueValue, this implementation generates a unique value by concatenating a newly created object's hashCode(), the current time (in milliseconds), and this system's hostname generated by InternetAddress.getLocalAddress().

getEncoding

public static java.lang.String getEncoding(java.lang.String type,
                                           java.lang.String defaultEncoding)
Extract a Java encoding from a Content-Type's MIME character set.
